name: Waking Early for Christmas
description:
The second Twine game/IF in my Twine-A-Month series, this one's a small Christmassy game I wrote over the course of about two hours. It's much smaller and more akin to my Halloween game and my first game A Short Journey as opposed to my most recent one.

It's about a child who wakes up early on Christmas Day and the decisions you get to make as the child that decide if it'll be a good or bad Christmas. It's very short with only a few endings, but I tried to make it cute and pleasant so I hope y'all enjoy!

Merry Christmas and/or Happy Holidays!

Oh and extra credit to my friend James who is also my first ever patron! Your brother in the game is named after this good sweet boy.
